content: Backup can be saved to your third-party account (Dropbox, Box.com, OneDrive or Google Drive). You need to connect your third-party account (Dropbox, Box.com, OneDrive or Google Drive) before you will be able to save your backup there.

comment.text: This translation key describes a message used to explain that backup data can be saved to a third-party account, and an option to connect such an account is available. It appears in various UI elements where the user has access to or has chosen to use third-party backup services like Dropbox, Box.com, OneDrive, or Google Drive.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Inconsistency in spacing after 'دوت كوم' in both occurrences. Should be standardized to a single space.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'بوكس دوت كوم' with 'بوكس دوت كوم' in both instances.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Inconsistency in the spacing before and after the 'أو' conjunctions. While not technically incorrect, it lacks uniformity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Standardize spacing before and after 'أو' conjunctions (e.g., 'دروب بوكس أو بوكس دوت كوم').

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Buna görə də" (Therefore) is not the best fit. It doesn't flow naturally within the context of explaining a prerequisite.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider removing "Buna görə də" or replacing it with a more suitable phrase like "Bu səbəbdən" (For this reason) or simply removing it for a more concise sentence.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The repetition of "öz üçüncü tərəf hesabınızı" (your third-party account) in the second sentence is awkward. While technically correct, it can be improved for clarity and flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Rephrase the second sentence to avoid the direct repetition. For example: "Ehtiyat nüsxələrinizi yadda saxlaya bilmək üçün əvvəlcə üçüncü tərəf hesabınızı (Dropbox, Box.com, OneDrive və ya Google Drive) ilə əlaqələndirməlisiniz."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "Архивното копие" (Arhivnoto kopie) translates to 'Archive copy' which is less natural than 'Backup' in this context. A more natural translation would be "Резервното копие" (Rezervnoto kopie).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace "Архивното копие" with "Резервното копие"

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The repetition of "профил от трета страна" (profil ot treta strana) sounds slightly awkward in Bulgarian. While technically correct, it can be rephrased for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing the repeated phrase to something like "външен акаунт" (vaneshen akount) or simply removing the repetition and implying it from context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "преди да можете да запазите резервното си копие там" (predi da mozete da zapazite rezervnoto si kopie tam) can be more concisely translated.  It's a little verbose.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace with something like "преди да можете да го запазите там" (predi da mozete da go zapazite tam)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Disk Google' should be 'Google Disk'.  'Disk' is the literal translation of 'Disk' and isn't natural Czech for Google Drive.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Zálohu lze uložit na účet třetí strany (Dropbox, Box.com, OneDrive nebo Google Disk).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The second sentence is incomplete. It's missing a verb at the end.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Předtím, než tam budete moci zálohu uložit, musíte připojit účet třetí strany (Dropbox, Box.com, OneDrive nebo Google Disk).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Ihr Konto' is repeated. It's a bit redundant and reads awkwardly in German. While grammatically correct, it could be more concise.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Die Sicherungskopie kann in Ihrem Konto bei einem Drittanbieter (Dropbox, Box.com, OneDrive oder Google Drive) gespeichert werden. Sie müssen den Drittanbieter-Dienst (Dropbox, Box.com, OneDrive oder Google Drive) verbinden, bevor Sie Ihr Backup dort speichern können.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "երրորդ կողմի հաշվում" is a literal translation of "third-party account" and while technically correct, it sounds unnatural in Armenian. A more natural phrasing would be something like "տարրական պլատֆորմի հաշվում" (third-platform account) or simply "արտաքին հաշվում" (external account).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using "արտաքին հաշվում" or "տարրական պլատֆորմի հաշվում" instead of "երրորդ կողմի հաշվում".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The repeated list of third-party services (Dropbox, Box.com, OneDrive, Google Drive) appears clunky.  Consider rephrasing to avoid repetition.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Instead of repeating the list, consider saying something like: "Պահուստավորումը կարող է պահպանվել ձեր արտաքին հաշվում (օրինակ՝ Dropbox, Box.com, OneDrive կամ Google Drive). Դուք պետք է միացնեք ձեր արտաքին հաշվին (օրինակ՝ Dropbox, Box.com, OneDrive կամ Google Drive), նախքան Դուք կկարողանաք այնտեղ պահել Ձեր պահեստավորումը:" (Backup can be saved to your external account (for example, Dropbox, Box.com, OneDrive or Google Drive). You need to connect your external account (for example, Dropbox, Box.com, OneDrive or Google Drive) before you will be able to save your backup there.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of “Ձեր պահեստավորումը” sounds a bit formal in this context. Using a more informal pronoun would be more suitable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing “Ձեր պահեստավորումը” with “դուք պահեստավորումը”.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The repeated list of third-party services (Dropbox, Box.com, OneDrive, Google Drive) feels slightly redundant and could be improved for conciseness.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: バックアップは、Dropbox、Box.com、OneDrive、Google Drive などのサードパーティーアカウントに保存できます。バックアップを保存する前、これらのアカウントに接続する必要があります。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure 'バックアップを保存する前、～接続する必要があります' is grammatically correct, but can be softened to be more natural in Japanese. The '～必要があります' is a bit strong.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: バックアップを保存する前に、Dropbox、Box.com、OneDrive、Google Drive などのサードパーティーアカウントに接続する必要があります。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Inconsistent casing for 'DropBox' - should be 'Dropbox' throughout.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change 'DropBox' to 'Dropbox'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Inconsistent casing for 'Box.com' - should be 'Box.com' throughout.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: No change needed; ensure consistency.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Inconsistent casing for 'OneDrive' - should be 'OneDrive' throughout.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change 'OneDrive' to 'OneDrive'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Inconsistent casing for 'Google Drive' - should be 'Google Drive' throughout.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change 'Google Drive' to 'Google Drive'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase '그 곳에 백업을 저장하기 전에' (before saving your backup there) can be slightly more naturally phrased.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rewording to '백업을 저장하려면' (to save your backup) or '백업을 저장하기 위해서는' (in order to save your backup).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: There is a space before 'ຢູ່ທີ່ນັ້ນ' (at that place).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ສາມາດບັນທຶກຂໍ້ມູນສຳຮອງໄວ້ໃນບັນຊີພາກສ່ວນທີສາມຂອງທ່ານ (Dropbox, Box.com, OneDrive ຫຼື Google Drive). ທ່ານຕ້ອງເຊື່ອມຕໍ່ບັນຊີພາກສ່ວນທີສາມຂອງທ່ານ (Dropbox, Box.com, OneDrive ຫຼື Google Drive) ກ່ອນທີ່ທ່ານຈະສາມາດບັນທຶກການສຳຮອງຂໍ້ມູນຂອງທ່ານທີ່ນັ້ນ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ຢູ່ທີ່ນັ້ນ' (at that place) is a bit awkward. While technically correct, it's not the most natural way to express 'there'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ສາມາດບັນທຶກຂໍ້ມູນສຳຮອງໄວ້ໃນບັນຊີພາກສ່ວນທີສາມຂອງທ່ານ (Dropbox, Box.com, OneDrive ຫຼື Google Drive). ທ່ານຕ້ອງເຊື່ອມຕໍ່ບັນຊີພາກສ່ວນທີສາມຂອງທ່ານ (Dropbox, Box.com, OneDrive ຫຼື Google Drive) ກ່ອນທີ່ທ່ານຈະສາມາດບັນທຶກການສຳຮອງຂໍ້ມູນຂອງທ່ານຢູ່ທີ່ນັ້ນໄດ້.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Back-ups' is hyphenated. In Dutch, it's typically written as 'Backups'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Backups

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'kunt u opslaan' is a very formal way of saying 'can save'. A more natural phrasing would be 'u kunt opslaan' or even 'kan worden opgeslagen'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: u kunt opslaan

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "np." (e.g.) implies a non-exhaustive list, while the English text lists specific options.  This introduces a difference in meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove 'np.' and consider rephrasing to match the specificity of the English text, such as 'takich jak' (like) or simply listing the services.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The second sentence uses a slightly awkward phrasing 'Zanim jednak będziesz w stanie to zrobić, pamiętaj, aby podłączyć swoje konto...'. It is less direct and somewhat verbose compared to the English.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more direct phrasing like 'Musisz podłączyć swoje konto... aby móc zapisać kopię zapasową tam'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'serviço de terceiros' is a bit clunky and doesn't flow naturally. While technically correct, it's not the most idiomatic way to express 'third-party account' in Portuguese in this context. It sounds overly formal and repetitive.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like 'conta de terceiros' or simply rephrasing to avoid the explicit 'third-party' wording. For example: 'A cópia de segurança pode ser guardada na sua conta em serviços como Dropbox, Box.com, OneDrive ou Google Drive. Precisa de conectar a sua conta em serviços como Dropbox, Box.com, OneDrive ou Google Drive antes de poder salvar sua cópia de segurança lá.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence 'Precisa de conectar a sua conta do serviço oferecido por terceiros...' is grammatically awkward. The 'de' after 'conta' and the subsequent 'oferecido por terceiros' are unnecessary and add complexity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Simplify to: 'Precisa conectar a sua conta em...' or 'Precisa conectar sua conta em...'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The repetition of 'Dropbox, Box.com, OneDrive ou Google Drive' is a minor formatting issue. While necessary for clarity, it could be slightly improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a more concise phrasing such as: '...em serviços como Dropbox, Box.com, OneDrive ou Google Drive.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Puteți salva o copie de rezervă prin intermediu contului de stocare de la terți" is a bit clunky. 'Prin intermediu' is unnecessarily formal. A more natural phrasing would avoid it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Puteți salva o copie de rezervă în contul de stocare de la terți.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "înainte de a crea o copie de rezervă acolo" could be improved. The 'crea' is a bit stiff.  'salva' might be more aligned with the first sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: înainte de a salva copia de rezervă acolo.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Sinhala word 'වන්ඩ්‍රයිව්' is a transliteration of 'OneDrive' and could be improved for readability. A more accurate or established Sinhala term, if available, would be preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Research and use the proper Sinhala term for OneDrive, or retain the transliteration but consider adding a standardized form in parentheses for clarity.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ඔවුන්ගේ උපස්ථය සුරැකීම සඳහා' (to save your backup there) is slightly awkward.  It could be more naturally phrased.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to 'ඔවුන් වෙත උපස්ථය සුරැකීමට' or 'ඔවුන්ගෙන් උපස්ථය ලබා ගැනීමට'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'You need to connect...' is translated as a statement of necessity. While technically correct, a more user-friendly approach might be to frame it as an instruction or information. It could come across as slightly harsh.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to something like 'ඔබට ඔවුන් වෙත උපස්ථය සුරැකීමට අවශ්‍ය නම්, පළමුව...' (If you want to save your backup to them, first...)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovak translation of 'Google Drive' is 'Disk Google'. While understandable, 'Google Disk' or 'Google Drive' would be more accurate and commonly used.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'Disk Google' with 'Google Drive' or 'Google Disk'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrasing 'Zálohované údaje môžete uložiť' is slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing might be 'Môžete zálohovať údaje...'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider changing 'Zálohované údaje môžete uložiť' to 'Môžete zálohovať údaje...'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovak translation maintains the list format (Dropbox, Box.com, OneDrive, Google Drive) from the English. Ensure this is intentional and stylistically appropriate for Slovak.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Review the use of commas and spacing in the list to match typical Slovak style.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence 'Svoj račun pri zunanjem ponudniku (Dropbox, box.com, OneDrive ali Google Drive) morate predhodno povezati.' is slightly awkward due to the repetition of 'Svoj račun pri zunanjem ponudniku'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Svoj račun pri zunanjem ponudniku (Dropbox, box.com, OneDrive ali Google Drive) morate predhodno povezati, da boste lahko shranili svojo varnostno kopijo tam.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'öncelikle' (initially/first) is slightly awkward in this context. While not incorrect, it interrupts the flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider removing 'öncelikle' for a more natural flow: 'Üçüncü taraf hesabınızı bağlamanız gerekir, böylelikle yedeğinizi oraya kaydedebileceksiniz.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "在使用此功能之前" (Before using this feature) doesn't perfectly capture the meaning of "before you will be able to save your backup there." It implies a functionality use before the connection, which isn't the intended meaning. It should emphasize the prerequisite nature of the connection for saving.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 备份到第三方账户之前，您需要先连接您的第三方账户（Dropbox、Box.com、OneDrive 或 Google Drive）。(Before backing up to a third-party account, you need to connect your third-party account first.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "以便完成存储" (in order to complete storage) is a bit clunky and not the most natural way to express the purpose of connecting the third-party account.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 以便进行存储。(in order to perform storage) or 这样才能保存备份。(so you can save the backup)
